LanguageData.DesignatorCancelDesc: Prekini određeno građenje, rudarenje, teglenje, žetvu, i sve druge naredbe.
LanguageData.DesignatorCutPlantsDesc: Označava bilje koje će biti osječeno i uništeno. Biljke će biti potpuno uklonenje, ako ima hrane ili bilo kojeg drugog resursa bit će uzet.
LanguageData.DesignatorDeconstructDesc: Dekonstruiši ovo i povrati nazad dio resursa.
LanguageData.DesignatorUninstallDesc: Deinstaliraj ovo tako da može biti pomjereno, prodano, ili postavljeno negdje drugo.
LanguageData.DesignatorHarvestDesc: Označava biljke koje će biti pokošene za njihovu hranu i druge produkte.
LanguageData.DesignatorHarvestWoodDesc: Označava drveće koja će biti osječena za drvljad.
LanguageData.DesignatorHaulThingsDesc: Označava kamenje i druge stvari koje će biti prenijete do područja za odlaganje. Nije potrebno za stvari kao hrana ili mrtva tijela, jer su uvijek prenosivi.
LanguageData.MustHaulHaulables: Može samo označiti stvari koje je potrebno prenijeti ali ne stvari koje se stalno prenose.
LanguageData.DesignatorHuntDesc: Označava životinje koje će biti ulovljene od strane vaših lovaca.
LanguageData.DesignatorMineDesc: Oznaći područja kamena ili rude koja će biti iskopana.
LanguageData.DesignatorSmoothFloorDesc: Oznaći loš kameni teren za izravnavanje i uglađivanje.
LanguageData.DesignatorPlanDesc: Postavi planske dezignacije. Oni nemaju funkciju osim toga što vam pomažu da planirate ubuduće ekspanzije.
LanguageData.DesignatorAreaHomeExpandDesc: Colonists will repair buildings, clean floors, and extinguish fires only in the home area.
LanguageData.DesignatorAreaHomeClearDesc: Removes a home area. Colonists will no longer clean, repair, or extinguish fires here.
LanguageData.DesignatorAreaBuildRoofExpandDesc: Colonists will build roofs in this area.
LanguageData.DesignatorAreaBuildRoofClearDesc: Remove the area where colonists will build roofs. Existing roofs will remain, but colonists won't build more.
LanguageData.DesignatorAreaNoRoofExpandDesc: Colonists will remove roofs in this area (except overhead mountain, which cannot be removed).
LanguageData.DesignatorAreaNoRoofClearDesc: Removes no-roof area, so colonists will no longer remove roofs.
LanguageData.DesignatorAreaSnowClearExpandDesc: Create a area which colonists will try to keep clear of snow.
LanguageData.DesignatorAreaSnowClearClearDesc: Removes a snow clearing area. Colonists will no longer try to keep this area clear of snow.
LanguageData.DesignatorExpandAreaAllowedDesc: Expand an allowed area.\n\nAllowed areas are defined areas you can assign to colonists. Colonists will not accept work or fulfill their needs outside their allowed area.
LanguageData.DesignatorClearAreaAllowedDesc: Clear cells from an allowed area.\n\nAllowed area are defined areas you can assign to colonists. Colonists will not accept work or fulfill their needs outside their allowed area.
LanguageData.DesignatorGrowingZoneDesc: Create a zone where your colonists will try to grow a certain kind of plant.
LanguageData.DesignatorZoneCreateStorageResourcesDesc: Create a stockpile where your colonists will store resources.\nThis tool can also expand any existing stockpile.
LanguageData.DesignatorZoneCreateStorageDumpingDesc: Create a stockpile where your colonists will store junk.\nThis tool can also expand any existing stockpile.
LanguageData.DesignatorZoneDeleteDesc: Ukloni zone, kao zone za skladištenje ili zone za rast.
LanguageData.DesignatorClaimDesc: Claim neutral structures for the colony, including ancient ruins and abandoned siege bases. Claimed structures can be repaired and maintained by your colonists.
LanguageData.DesignatorRemoveFloorDesc: Uklonite pod da bi otkrili teren ispod.
LanguageData.DesignatorStripDesc: Skini odjeću sa mrtvih tijela i ranjenih.
LanguageData.DesignatorRearmTrapDesc: Reaktiviraj iskorištenu zamku tako da se može ponovno koristiti.
LanguageData.CannotPlaceInUndiscovered: Ne može se postaviti u neistraženim područjima..
LanguageData.TerrainBeingSmoothed: Teren je već označen za poravnjavanje.
